name: date
description: Flight date

name: airline
description: Airline identifier assigned by US DOT

name: flight_number
description: Flight identifier

name: tail_number
description: Aircraft identifier

name: origin_airport
description: Origin airport identifier (IATA code)

name: destination_airport
description: Destination airport identifier (IATA code)

name: distance
description: Distance between the airports, in miles

name: scheduled_departure
description: Planned departure time (hours, minutes)

name: departure_time
description: Departure time (hours, minutes)

name: departure_delay
description: Total departure delay, in minutes (can be negative)

name: scheduled_arrival
description: Planned arrival time (hours, minutes)

name: arrival_time
description: Arrival time (hours, minutes)

name: arrival_delay
description: Total arrival delay, in minutes (can be negative)

name: scheduled_time
description: Planned time amount needed for the flight trip, in minutes

name: elapsed_time
description: Actual time amount for the flight trip (or sum of air time, taxi out, taxi in), in minutes

name: cancelled
description: Is the flight cancelled, Yes (1) or No (0)

name: diverted
description: Is the flight diverted, Yes (1) or No (0)

name: cancellation_reason
description: Reason for flight cancellation: A - Airline/Carrier; B - Weather; C - National Air System; D - Security

name: air_system_delay
description: Delay caused by air system, in minutes

name: security_delay
description: Delay caused by security, in minutes

name: airline_delay
description: Delay caused by airline, in minutes

name: late_aircraft_delay
description: Delay caused by aircraft, in minutes

name: weather_delay
description: Delay caused by weather, in minutes

name: wheels_off
description: Take off time (hours, minutes)

name: wheels_on
description: Landing time (hours, minutes)

name: air_time
description: Time in air (between wheels off and wheels on), in minutes

name: taxi_out
description: Time between off-block and take off, in minutes

name: taxi_in
description: Time between landing and in-block, in minutes
